phrases: It does not hurt, it does not hurt!
Let us go home and take some medicine!
All right, one more to go!
Looks like it is all over.
l would have liked to have gone up against that guy one more time.
You are not very cheerful, huh?
Hitting three consecutive home runs is incredible, is not it?
Is there something you are not satisfied with?
I am not a baseball player.
I know that, but unless you have a job, you cannot make a living, right?
After the next guy, you will be up!
I will be counting on you to smash it!
There is a bonus in it for you!
Just leave it to me, coach.
I will be sure to hit a home run, just you watch.
I do not care... if it... hurts you... let him hit you!
Get hit by the pitch... and load the bases!
If you want to get hit so badly!
You hit me on purpose, did not you!?
You were trying to get hit!
You want to go at it!?
If you go in there, people are going to get hurt!
I will go easy on them, okay?
Nice to see you after so long.
I will explain it all later.
In any case, please come with me.
Him and this Saiyan both lost to each other.
But still, that is just like Goku.
Oh, but please do not be all that worried about him.
We can bring him back to life with the Dragon Balls, after all.
This is not good, Yamucha- sama.
She is still mad about you standing her up on your last date
because you did not have any money.
T- this does not necessarily mean that things are all patched up between us, okay?
This is a state of emergency, so I am just working together with you temporarily.
If you were to apologize, though, that would be another story.
It does not bother me that I am not together with everyone else!
I do not care who comes attacking, I can take them on myself well enough.
T- that might be so, but it would be a shame!
Kami- sama said he was going to specially train us up in the Heavenly Realm!
You do not have to come if you do not want to.
I wonder how many days it has been.
If I do not step on it, a year will have gone by just like that.
But then, no one's going to help me.
Do not be scared, do not be scared.
You mean it was stuck in this deeply?
It does not hurt, it does not hurt.
Sure enough, it is just like I read in books.
There are dinosaurs that do not eat meat.
It is been a long time since I have been this fired up!
The fighting is going to start up again, huh?
And there is only a slim hope of us winning.
No, that is not necessarily so!
This time, we will have Piccolo,
and Goku should be coming back to life even stronger, after all.
On top of all that, we are going to be able to undergo Kami- sama's training!
Depending on how our training goes, even we can still become stronger!
All right, let us do it!
I do not care who these Saiyan guys are,
I am going to make sure that they are the ones who are beaten!
They are getting along fine after all.
Do not be jealous, do not be jealous!
I have gotten quite a bit stronger too, huh?
But this time, leave some for me, okay?
Gohan learns for the first time how harsh the laws of nature are.
However, he cannot shrink back now.
The Saiyans will not wait for him!
